H0.text: In which country is Lake Como. Switzerland

H1.text: In which country is Lake Como. Austria

H2.text: In which country is Lake Como. Slovenia

H3.text: In which country is Lake Como. ItalY

A4.text: Lake Como, also known as Lario, is a lake of glacial origin in Lombardy, Italy.

A5.text: Lake Como is situated in the Lombardy region of Northern Italy, at the southern end of the Alps, about 45 km north of Milan.
